text.fogoverrides.title: Fog Overrides
text.fogoverrides.option.spectator_fog.t: If the mod should override the spectator mode fog.
text.fogoverrides.option.spectator_fog_s: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in spectator mode.
text.fogoverrides.option.spectator_fog_e: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in spectator mode.
text.fogoverrides.option.spectator_water: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in spectator mode when under water.
The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in spectator mode when under water.
text.fogoverrides.option.spectator_lava_: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in spectator mode when under lava.
The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in spectator mode when under lava.
text.fogoverrides.option.creative_fog.to: If the mod should override the creative mode fog.
text.fogoverrides.option.creative_fog_st: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in creative mode.
text.fogoverrides.option.creative_fog_en: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in creative mode.
text.fogoverrides.option.creative_water_: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in creative mode when under water.
The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in creative mode when under water.
text.fogoverrides.option.creative_lava_f: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering in creative mode when under lava.
The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should become fully opaque in creative mode when under lava.
text.fogoverrides.option.cloud_height.to: The Y-level where the clouds should be rendered.
text.fogoverrides.option.water-overlay-e: If the overlay texture when the camera is under water should be rendered.
text.fogoverrides.option.fire-overlay-en: If the fire overlay texture when the player is on fire should be rendered.
text.fogoverrides.option.fire-overlay-of: The y-offset the fire overlay should be moved by.
text.fogoverrides.option.fire-potion-ove: The y-offset the fire overlay should be moved by when there's an active fire resistance potion.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_fog.to: If the mod should override the fog in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.fog_enabled.too: If the fog is enabled in the specified location at all.
text.fogoverrides.option.fog_start_dista: The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should start rendering.
text.fogoverrides.option.fog_end_distanc: The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should become fully opaque.
text.fogoverrides.error.fog_distance: The fog near distance value has to be smaller than the fog far distance.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_sky_co: If the mod should override the sky color in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.sky_color.toolt: The color of the sky in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.fog_color.toolt: The color of the fog in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_fog_co: If the mod should override the fog color in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_water_: If the mod should override the water fog in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_fog_start: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering under water.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_fog_end_d: The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should become fully opaque under water.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_potion_ef: If the mod should adjust the water fog when a water breathing potion is active.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_potion_fo: Water Breathing Potion Fog Near Distance
The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should start rendering under water when a water breathing potion is active.
Water Breathing Potion Fog Far Distance
The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should become fully opaque under water when a water breathing potion is active.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_water_: If the mod should override the water color in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_color.too: The color of the water in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_water_: If the mod should override the water fog color in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.water_fog_color: The color of the water fog in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.override_lava_f: If the mod should override the lava fog in the specified location.
text.fogoverrides.option.lava_fog_start_: The amount of blocks away from the camera the fog should start rendering under lava.
text.fogoverrides.option.lava_fog_end_di: The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should become fully opaque under lava.
text.fogoverrides.option.lava_potion_eff: If the mod should adjust the lava fog when a fire resistance potion is active.
text.fogoverrides.option.lava_potion_fog: Fire Resistance Potion Fog Near Distance
The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should start rendering under lava when a fire resistance potion is active.
Fire Resistance Potion Fog Far Distance
The amount of blocks away from the camera that the fog should become fully opaque under lava when a fire resistance potion is active.
text.fogoverrides.key.open_menu.tooltip: Choose a keybinding to open the Fog Overrides config screen while in game.
